page.title: 04Life N.of A580 at Worsley
page.content: {Homelife}-We made a"Day in the Life of"diary of a boy,girl,mum & grandad. We found weekdays were work for adults & school for children.Weekends were family orientated,being for visits to relatives/seaside/pleasure park & work in house & garden.Few went to church. {Entertainment}-mostly home-based,T.V. important for adults & children.50% have videos & 45% home computers.A few visited cinema/theatre/ballet. {Recreation}-Cubs/Scouts,Brownie/Guides Youth Clubs,Swimming,Cricket & Soccer for children.Eating out,visiting pub, gardening,dressmaking,D.I.Y.were relaxation for parents.Most children listed"playing out"as their main recreation. {Employment}-90% of mothers work,mainly part-time & near home.Fathers work mostly within 20 miles of home.Very small minority go abroad on business.
